Google Cloud Storage authentication

CREDS = f'{os.getcwd()}/google-drive-d2e64a7dbc90.json' %env GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=$CREDS

Get file paths

For lexeme data

{% raw %}

get_fpaths_lex[source]

get_fpaths_lex(LEX, CORPUS_DIR='data/', source='local', bucket_name='socemb')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fpaths_lex = get_fpaths_lex('Anglo-Saxon', source='local')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fpaths_lex

['data/Anglo-Saxon/Anglo-Saxon_2006-02-04--2020-08-13.csv',
 'data/Anglo-Saxon/Anglo-Saxon_2019-12-31--2020-10-06.csv']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert len(fpaths_lex) == 2
{% endraw %}

For subreddit data

{% raw %} 
SUBREDDIT = 'politics'
LIMIT = 100
YEAR = 2007
YEARS = [year for year in range(2007, 2021)]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fpath_comm_subr_yr = f'data/subreddit/{SUBREDDIT}/{LIMIT}_{YEAR}.csv'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_fpath_subr_yr[source]

get_fpath_subr_yr(SUBREDDIT, LIMIT, YEAR)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
get_fpath_subr_yr(SUBREDDIT, LIMIT, YEAR) == 'data/subreddit/politics/100_2007.csv'

True
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_fpaths_subr_yrs[source]

get_fpaths_subr_yrs(SUBREDDIT, LIMIT, YEARS)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert len(get_fpaths_subr_yrs(SUBREDDIT, LIMIT, YEARS)) == 14
{% endraw %}

Read comments

Read comments csv file

{% raw %} 
fpath = 'data/subreddit/politics/100_2007.csv'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

read_comm_csv[source]

read_comm_csv(fpath)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comments = read_comm_csv(fpath)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert len(comments) == 100
{% endraw %}

Concatenate comment csv files

{% raw %}

concat_comment_csvs[source]

concat_comment_csvs(fpaths)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
fpaths = get_fpaths_subr_yrs(SUBREDDIT, LIMIT, YEARS)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comments = concat_comment_csvs(fpaths)

Parse dates

{% raw %}

parse_dates[source]

parse_dates(comments)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
comments = parse_dates(comments)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
